noun.description: A person, in particular a woman, who engages in sexual activity for payment.

verb.description: Offer (someone) for sexual activity in exchange for payment.
examples: although she was paid $15 to join a man at his table, she never prostituted herself

origin: Mid 16th century (as a verb): from Latin prostitut- exposed publicly, offered for sale, from the verb prostituere, from pro- before + statuere set up, place.
